article_title: E.J. Dionne Jr.: Clinton, Sanders and 'visionary gradualism'
article_text:
By E.J. Dionne Jr.

The Washington Post

Posted May. 20, 2016 at 8:15 AM

article_metadata.description: The success of Bernie Sanders' insurgency is a marvel and an achievement.
article_metadata.author: E.J. Dionne Jr. The Washington Post
